item.title: Sqllogic test
item.description: The database return right with different handlers, for example MySQL and http Usage Prepare Change to the scripts dir: cd tests/logictest/ Make sure python3 is installed. You can use Poetry to install dependency, dependency see tests/pyproject.toml If you are familiar with pip, you can install dependency with: pip install -r requirements.txt Need to know Cases from tests/suites/0_stateless/ to tests/logictest/suites/gen/ If a case file already exists in gen/, gen_suites will ignore it.
